title: Elias and The Legend of Sirok
description: Out of print - - - Into the World of Dreams and Fears… Elias, an artist, is at odds with his life on his father’s farm, and is forced to make a decision about his future. His grandmother, Nagymama, prepares him for a journey of discovery that takes him from his Hungarian village into a supernatural world. Here he faces powers and mystical beings—some that he strives to understand, while others he is forced to battle. With help from Zoltan, a wise man, he finally confronts the Sarkany, a dragon that changes shape at whim and will. Will Elias triumph over the dark powers around him? If he survives, what will he learn—about life and himself?
author: Edward G. Kardos
